message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to offer $75 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $82.
I'm getting closer, but I still think we can do better. I'm willing to offer $78 for the product.
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I'm offering the product to you for $85.
I'm still not convinced, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm offering $81 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm offering the product to you for $87.
I'm still not satisfied, but I'm willing to make a final offer. I'm offering $83 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm offering the product to you for $89.
I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm offering $84 for the product.
